jot.physics.solidBodies

Class AbstractSolidBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.solidBodies.AbstractSolidBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SolidBox, SolidSphere

    public abstract class AbstractSolidBody
extends Object
    The base abstract class representing solid bodies in the simulation. It holds information about position, scale and rotation of the solid as well as lateral and angular velocity. It does not represent any shape; this is handled by the subclasses. To expose the shape to the simulation, methods for evaluating the signed distance to the solid, the gradient of the distance function and the closest point on the surface of the solid are exposed.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
